name: lf-lh-gov-serveress-ssm
description: Lake Formation governance using Serverless Framework v3 with SSM Parameter Store

scripts.deploy:all: cd stack-0-lf-tags && serverless deploy && cd ../stack-1-resources && serverless deploy && cd ../stack-2-permissions && npm install && serverless deploy
scripts.remove:all: cd stack-2-permissions && serverless remove && cd ../stack-1-resources && serverless remove && cd ../stack-0-lf-tags && serverless remove
scripts.deploy:stack2: cd stack-2-permissions && npm install && serverless deploy
